SwitchPreference.android:title: Collect From Watch
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Collect accelerometer, gyroscope and heart rate data from a smart watch.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Enable Box Integration
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Allow survey uploads to Box.com accounts directly from the phone.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Lock Phone Interface to Watch Response
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Locks phone actions (such as starting or stopping walks) unless there is a response from the wearable device
